title: A dialogue of polygamy, written orginally in Italian rendred into English by a person of quality ; and dedicated to the author of that well-known treatise call'd, Advice to a son.
author: Ochino, Bernardino, 1487-1564.
notes: "A dialogue of divorce": 61 p. at end.
Attributed to Bernardino Ochino. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
